mapper.update:
UPDATE data_league_match SET
data_league_match.KickAt = #{ kickAt },
data_league_match.HomeScore = #{ homeScore },
data_league_match.GuestScore = #{ guestScore },
data_league_match.HomeClubId = #{ homeClubId },
data_league_match.HomeClubHistoryId = #{ homeClubHistoryId },
data_league_match.GuestClubId = #{ guestClubId },
data_league_match.GuestClubHistoryId = #{ guestClubHistoryId },
data_league_match.Round = #{ round },
data_league_match.Knockout = #{ knockout },
data_league_match.Weekday = #{ weekday },
data_league_match.Stadium = #{ stadium },
data_league_match.LeagueId = #{ leagueId },
data_league_match.LeagueSubId = #{ leagueSubId },
data_league_match.Audiences = #{ audiences },
data_league_match.RelativeTag = #{ relativeTag },
data_league_match.VideoUrl = #{ videoUrl },
data_league_match.Year = #{ year },
data_league_match.MatchStatus = #{ matchStatus },
data_league_match.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_league_match.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
